sentences.en: The fisherman rowed us back to the shore.
sentences.cn: 渔夫划船将我们送回到岸上。

sentences.en: Spyros Latsis started his career as a humble fisherman in the Aegean.
sentences.cn: 斯派罗斯·拉齐斯最初的职业是爱琴海的一名地位低微的渔夫。

sentences.en: With great difficulty, the fisherman manoeuvred his small craft close to the reef.
sentences.cn: 渔夫艰难地驾着小船靠近了礁石。
